name: no_investigation

name: num_officers_other_duty_areas
description: Number of sworn personnel working primarily in another duty area.

name: num_officers_other_split_duty_combination
description: Number of sworn personnel working in another, unlisted split-duty combination.

name: num_officers_sro_duties
description: Number of full-time sworn personnel who serve as school resource officers or other sworn personnel whose primary duties are related to school safety (except crossing guards).

name: operate_basic_training

name: operate_forensic_crime_lab

name: operate_jail

name: operate_temp_holding_no_overnight
description: Agency regularly performs or has primary responsibility for operating a temporary holding cell not for overnight detention.

name: operate_temp_holding_overnight
description: Agency regularly performs or has primary responsibility for operating an overnight lockup or temporary holding facility separate from a jail.

name: other_investigation

name: other_specialized
description: Agency regularly performs or has primary responsibility for other, unlisted specialized functions.

name: other_specialized_specify

name: other_task_force_participation

name: other_task_force_specify
description: Specification of other, unlisted task force.

name: parking_enforcement

name: pt_civilian

name: pt_sworn_full_arrest_powers

name: school_crossing_service
description: Agency regularly performs or has primary responsibility for school crossing services.

name: search_rescue

name: serving_eviction_notices

name: serving_process

name: state
description: State code.

name: statename
description: Name of state.

name: subtype1
description: Special jurisdiction: specific type.

name: subtype2
description: Special jurisdiction: specific type.

name: swat_tactical_ops
description: Agency regularly performs or has primary responsibility for tactical operations (SWAT).

name: total_ft_sworn
description: Total actual number of full-time sworn personnel.

name: total_operating_budget
description: Agency's total operating budget for fiscal or calendar year.

name: traffic_control
description: Agency regularly performs or has primary responsibility for traffic direction and control.

name: traffic_law_enforcement
description: Agency regularly performs or has primary responsibility for traffic law enforcement.

name: tribal
description: Tribal Agency indicator.

name: underwater_recovery
description: Agency regularly performs or has primary responsibility for underwater recovery.

name: violent_crime
description: Agency regularly performs or has primary responsibility for participation in violent crime task force.

name: zip
description: ZIP Code.

name: raw_row_number
description: An number used to join clean data back to the raw data

name: date
description: The date of the stop, in YYYY-MM-DD format. Some states do not provide the exact stop date: for example, they only provide the year or quarter in which the stop occurred. For these states, stop_date is set to the date at the beginning of the period: for example, January 1 if only year is provided.

name: time
description: The 24-hour time of the stop, in HH:MM format.

name: location
description: The freeform text of the location. Occasionally, this represents the concatenation of several raw fields, i.e. street_number, street_name.

name: lat
description: The latitude of the stop. If not provided by the department, we attempt to geocode any provided address or location using Google Maps. Google Maps returns a "best effort" response, which may not be completely accurate if the provided location was malformed or underspecified. To protect against suprious responses, geocodes more than 4 standard deviations from the median stop lat/lng are set to NA.

name: lng
description: The longitude of the stop. If not provided by the department, we attempt to geocode any provided address or location using Google Maps. Google Maps returns a "best effort" response, which may not be completely accurate if the provided location was malformed or underspecified. To protect against suprious responses, geocodes more than 4 standard deviations from the median stop lat/lng are set to NA.

name: county_name
description: County name where provided.

name: neighborhood
description: This is the neighborhood of the stop and some police departments will provide this instead of a location or beat.

name: beat
description: Police beat. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the beat using the shapefiles.

name: district
description: Police district. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the district using the shapefiles.

name: subdistrict
description: Police subdistrict. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the subdistrict using the shapefiles.

name: division
description: Police division. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the division using the shapefiles.

name: subdivision
description: Police subdivision. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the subdivision using the shapefiles.

name: police_grid_number
description: Police grid number. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the police grid number using the shapefiles.

name: precinct
description: Police precinct. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the precinct using the shapefiles.

name: region
description: Police region. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the region using the shapefiles.

name: reporting_area
description: Police reporting area. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the reporting area using the shapefiles.

name: sector
description: Police sector. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the sector using the shapefiles.

name: subsector
description: Police subsector. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the subsector using the shapefiles.

name: substation
description: Police substation. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the substation using the shapefiles.

name: service_area
description: Police service area. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the service area using the shapefiles.

name: zone
description: Police zone. If not provided, but we have retrieved police department shapefiles and the location of the stop, we geocode the stop and find the zone using the shapefiles.

name: subject_age
description: The age of the stopped subject. When date of birth is given, we calculate the age based on the stop date. Values outside the range of 10-110 are coerced to NA.

name: subject_race
description: The race of the stopped subject. Values are standardized to white, black, hispanic, asian/pacific islander, and other/unknown

name: subject_sex
description: The recorded sex of the stopped subject.

name: officer_id_hash
description: A unique hash of the officer id used to identify individual officers within a location. This is usually just a hash of the provided officer ID or badge number.

name: officer_age
description: The age of the stopped officer. When date of birth is given, we calculate the age based on the stop date. Values outside the range of 10-100 are coerced to NA.

name: officer_race
description: The race of the stopped officer. Values are standardized to white, black, hispanic, asian/pacific islander, and other/unknown

name: officer_sex
description: The recorded sex of the stopped officer.

name: officer_years_of_service
description: Number of years officer has been with the police department.

name: officer_assignment
description: Department or subdivision to which officer has been assigned.

name: department_id
description: ID of department or subdivision to which officer has been assigned.

name: department_name
description: Name of department or subdivision to which officer has been assigned.

name: unit
description: Unit to which officer has been assigned.

name: type
description: Type of stop: vehicular or pedestrian.

name: disposition
description: Disposition of stop where provided. What is recorded here varies widely across police departments.

name: violation
description: Specific violation of stop where provided. What is recorded here varies widely across police departments.

name: arrest_made
description: Indicates whether an arrest made.

name: citation_issued
description: Indicates whether a citation was issued.

name: warning_issued
description: Indicates whether a warning was issued.

name: outcome
description: The strictest action taken among arrest, citation, warning, and summons.

name: contraband_found
description: Indicates whether contraband was found

name: contraband_drugs
description: Indicates whether drugs were found. This is only defined when contraband_found is true.

name: contraband_weapons
description: Indicates whether weapons were found. This is only defined when contraband_found is true.

name: contraband_other
description: ndicates whether contraband other than drugs and weapons were found. This is only defined when contraband_found is true.

name: frisk_performed
description: Indicates whether a frisk was performed. This is technically different from a search, but departments will sometimes include frisks as a search type.

name: search_conducted
description: Indicates whether any type of search was conducted, i.e. driver, passenger, vehicle. Frisks are excluded where the department has provided resolution on both.

name: search_person
description: Indicates whether a search of a person has occurred. This is only defined when search_conducted is TRUE.

name: search_vehicle
description: Indicates whether a search of a vehicle has occurred. This is only defined when search_conducted is TRUE.

name: search_basis
description: This provides the reason for the search where provided and is categorized into k9, plain view, consent, probable cause, and other. If a search occurred but the reason wasn't listed, we assume probable cause.

name: reason_for_arrest
description: A freeform text field indicating the reason for arrest where provided.

name: reason_for_frisk
description: A freeform text field indicating the reason for frisk where provided.

name: reason_for_search
description: A freeform text field indicating the reason for search where provided.

name: reason_for_stop
description: A freeform text field indicating the reason for the stop where provided.

name: speed
description: The recorded speed of the vehicle for the stop.

name: posted_speed
description: The speed limit where the stop was recorded.

name: use_of_force_description
description: A freeform text field describing the use of force.

name: use_of_force_reason
description: A freeform text field describing the reason for the use of force.

name: vehicle_color
description: A freeform text of the vehicle color where provided; format varies widely.

name: vehicle_make
description: A freeform text of the vehicle make where provided; format varies widely.

name: vehicle_model
description: A freeform text of the vehicle model where provided; format varies widely.

name: vehicle_type
description: A freeform text of the vehicle type where provided; format varies widely.

name: vehicle_registration_state
description: A freeform text of the vehicle registration state where provided; format varies widely.

name: vehicle_year
description: Vehicle manufacture year where provided. This value is NA for any year before 1800.

name: notes
description: A freeform text field containing any officer notes.

name: academy_training
description: Total hours of academy training required of agency's new officer recruits.

name: address
description: State Agency Address

name: afis
description: Does agency use Automated Fingerprint Identification System on a regular basis?

name: aircraft
description: Does agency use manned aircraft such as airplanes or helicopters?

name: armored_vehicles
description: Does agency use armored vehicles?

name: authorized_flashbangs
description: Are diversionary devices such as flashbangs authorized for use by full-time sworn personnel (all sworn, some sworn, or none)?

name: authorized_tear_gas
description: Are chemical agent projectiles such as tear gas authorized for use by full-time sworn personnel? (all sworn, some sworn, or none)?

name: ballistic_imaging
description: Does agency use ballistic imaging on a regular basis?

name: black
description: Percentage of Black or African-American residents in state.

name: bwc
description: About how many body worn cameras are currently in service?

name: bwc_deployment
description: "How would you describe the current state of body-worn camera deployment in your agency?"

name: city
description: State agency city.

name: civilianization
description: Percentage of non-sworn employees/total employees.

name: collective_bargaining_civilian
description: Level of collective bargaining rights authorized for agency's non-sworn personnel. (all, some, none).

name: collective_bargaining_deputy
description: Level of collective bargaining rights authorized for agency's officers/deputies with limited arrest powers. (all, some, none).

name: collective_bargaining_sworn
description: Level of collective bargaining rights authorized for agency's sworn employees with arrest powers. (all, some, none).

name: csllea08_id
description: From LEAR: unique CSLLEA ID.

name: drone
description: Does agency use drones?

name: educational_incentive
description: Agency offers incentives based on educational achievement.

name: facial_recognition
description: Does agency use facial recognition on a regular basis?

name: female
description: Number of female employees.

name: field_training
description: Total hours of field training required of agency's new officer recruits.

name: firearm_tracing
description: Does agency use firearm tracing on a regular basis?

name: foreign
description: Percentage of foreign-born residents in state.

name: funding_source_asset_forefit
description: Agency's operational expenses funded by asset forfeiture program.

name: funding_source_contracts
description: Agency's operational expenses funded by payment for contracted law enforcement services.

name: funding_source_county
description: Agency's operational expenses funded by one or more county governments.

name: funding_source_federal
description: Agency's operational expenses funded by one or more federal government agencies.

name: funding_source_municipal
description: Agency's operational expenses funded by one or more municipal governments.

name: funding_source_other
description: Agency's operational expenses funded by other source (specified).

name: funding_source_state
description: Agency's operational expenses funded by one or more state government agencies.

name: funding_source_user_fees
description: Agency's operational expenses funded by user fees.

name: gps
description: Does agency use Global Positioning System on a regular basis?

name: gunshot_detection
description: Does agency use gunshot detection on a regular basis?

name: height
description: Difference between chief's maximum salary and entry-level officer's minimum salary, divided by entry-level officer's minimum salary.

name: in_service_training
description: Average hours of in-service training annually required of agency's non-probationary field/patrol officers.

name: incidents_per_capita
description: Percentage of total crime incidents over population.

name: index
description: Indexed position.

name: infrared
description: Does agency use infrared (thermal) imagers on a regular basis?

name: issued_full_auto
description: Are fully-automatic rifles issued or authorized for use by full-time sworn personnel?

name: issued_semi_auto
description: Are semi-automatic rifles issued or authorized for use by full-time sworn personnel?

name: labor_types_civic
description: Number of civic-sumptuary police labor activities recorded.

name: labor_types_investigative
description: Number of investigative police labor activities recorded.

name: labor_types_patrol
description: Number of patrol police labor activities recorded.

name: labor_types_polemic
description: Number of polemic police labor activities recorded.

name: labor_types_sentry
description: Number of sentry-dataveillant police labor activities recorded

name: latinx
description: Percentage of Latinx residents in state.

name: lpr
description: Does agency use license plate readers on a regular basis?

name: male
description: Number of male employees.

name: merit_pay
description: Agency offers incentives based on special skills or vocational training.

name: minimum_education
description: Minimum education required to become officer:

name: mobility_adult
description: Percentage of population 30-39 years who moved from different state.

name: mobility_child
description: Percentage of population 1 -4 years who moved from different state.

name: mobility_lateteen
description: Percentage of population 18-19 years who moved from different state.

name: mobility_middle
description: Percentage of population 40-64 years who moved from different state.

name: mobility_preteen
description: Percentage of population 5-17 years who moved from different state.

name: mobility_senior
description: Percentage of population 65 years & older who moved from different state.

name: mobility_youngadult
description: Percentage of population 20-29 years who moved from different state.

name: name
description: Agency name.

name: non_sworn_employees
description: Number of non-sworn employees.

name: nonwhite
description: Percentage of residents in state who ID as anything but "White alone, not Hispanic or Latino".

name: p1
description: Total Part I crime estimate.

name: p1_property
description: Estimated non-violent Part I crimes per 1000 in population.

name: p1_property_raw
description: Estimated Part I non-violent crimes.

name: p1_violent
description: Estimated violent Part I offenses per 1000 in population.

name: p1_violent_raw
description: Estimated Part I violent crimes.

name: partnership
description: Does agency partner with any community group(s) besides other law enforcement agencies?

name: partnership_type_collaboration
description: Score for collaboration community partnership activities.

name: partnership_type_cooperation
description: Score for cooperation community partnership activities.

name: partnership_type_coordination
description: Score for coordination community partnership activities.

name: partnership_type_fully_institutionalized
description: Total community partnership score divided by maximum possible score.

name: partnership_type_information_sharing
description: Score for information sharing community partnership activities.

name: partnership_type_symbolic
description: Score for symbolic community partnership activities.

name: patrol_strategy_automobile
description: Does agency use automobiles (other than motorcycles) on field/patrol work?

name: patrol_strategy_bicycle_or_segway
description: Does agency use bicycles or human transport (e.g. Segway) on field/patrol work?

name: patrol_strategy_foot
description: Does agency use foot patrols on field/patrol work?

name: patrol_strategy_motorcycle
description: Does agency use motorcycles on field/patrol work?

name: patrol_strategy_other
description: Does agency use other strategies on field/patrol work? (e.g. Horse, aircraft, boat?)

name: per_officer_expenditure
description: Agency's operational budget divided by number of sworn officers.

name: policy_deadly_force
description: Agency has written policy or procedural directives on use of deadly force/firearm discharge.

name: policy_homelessness
description: Agency has written policy or procedural directives on treating persons experiencing homelessness.

name: policy_icd
description: Agency has written policy or procedural directives on treating persons who die while in custody.

name: policy_juveniles
description: Agency has written policy or procedural directives on treating persons classified as juveniles.

name: policy_level
description: Number of written policies for specific situations.

name: policy_mentally_ill
description: Agency has written policy or procedural directives on treating persons who experience mental illness.

name: policy_racial_profiling
description: Agency has written policy or procedural directives on avoiding racial profiling or promoting unbiased policing.

name: pop_per_sq_mile
description: Population per square mile.

name: population
description: Total state population.

name: poverty
description: Percentage of calculated population living below poverty level.

name: property_crime_severity
description: Estimated percentage of total property crimes over P1.

name: renter
description: Percentage of residents in state who rent primary residence.

name: required_training
description: Total number of hours of required training per officer.

name: service_call_dispatch
description: Percentage of total calls for service resulting in a dispatch.

name: severity_homicide
description: Estimated percentage of criminal homicides over P1.

name: single_parent_headed_household
description: Percentage of family households in state held by single parents with own children under 18 years

name: spatial_dispersion
description: Number of stations.

name: state
description: Agency state.

name: svt
description: Does agency use stolen vehicle tracking on a regular basis?

description: Number of sworn officers.

name: total_employees
description: Number of total employees.

name: tuition_reimbursement
description: Agency offers tuition reimbursement for continuing education, professional development, etc.

name: unemployed
description: Unemployment rate of population 16 years and over.

name: vehicle_sabotage
description: Does agency use electrical/engine disruption or tire deflation devices on a regular basis?

name: victim_support_model

name: violent_crime_severity
description: Estimated percentage of total violent crimes over P1.
